item.title: Confessions of a Software Developer: No More Self-Censorship - Kerrick Long (blog)
item.description: I haven't published since April because I've been afraid. What was I afraid of? In this post I detail every single thing I've avoided admitting on this blog.

item.title: Can Dutch universities do without Microsoft?
item.description: Can Dutch higher education part ways with Microsoft? The sector is trying to break free, and alternatives are being explored here and there. At the same time, more and more tasks are being completed by Microsoft tools.
